scripts.build: npm run build:linux && npm run build:darwin && npm run build:win32
scripts.build:darwin: npm run clean:darwin && electron-packager . "$npm_package_productName" --out=build/darwin --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.5 --ignore=$(cat .electronignore | sed -e 's-^/-\^/-g' | tr -s '\n' | tr '\n' '|' | sed -e 's/|$//g' -e 's/\./\\\./g' -e 's/\*/\.\*/g') --prune --asar
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean:linux && electron-packager . "$npm_package_productName" --out=build/linux --platform=linux  --arch=x64 --version=0.36.5 --ignore=$(cat .electronignore | sed -e 's-^/-\^/-g' | tr -s '\n' | tr '\n' '|' | sed -e 's/|$//g' -e 's/\./\\\./g' -e 's/\*/\.\*/g') --prune --asar
scripts.build:win32: npm run clean:win32 && electron-packager . "$npm_package_productName" --out=build/win32 --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.36.5 --ignore=$(cat .electronignore | sed -e 's-^/-\^/-g' | tr -s '\n' | tr '\n' '|' | sed -e 's/|$//g' -e 's/\./\\\./g' -e 's/\*/\.\*/g') --prune --asar
scripts.dist: npm run dist:linux && npm run dist:darwin && npm run dist:win32
scripts.dist:darwin: npm run build:darwin && mkdir -p "dist/darwin-$npm_package_version" && tar -czf "dist/darwin-$npm_package_version/$npm_package_productName-darwin-x64-$npm_package_version.tar.gz" -C build/darwin/ "$npm_package_productName-darwin-x64"
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:linux && mkdir -p "dist/linux-$npm_package_version" && tar -czf "dist/linux-$npm_package_version/$npm_package_productName-linux-x64-$npm_package_version.tar.gz" -C build/linux/ "$npm_package_productName-linux-x64"
scripts.dist:win32: npm run build:win32 && mkdir -p "dist/win32-$npm_package_version" && pushd build/win32 && zip -q -r "../../dist/win32-$npm_package_version/$npm_package_productName-win32-x64-$npm_package_version.zip" "$npm_package_productName-win32-x64" && popd
